textBeforeTable: Machine washable. The sleek T-Rex Slippers are a soft reminder of the prehistoric ages. Made of soft polyester fabric and a 1" foam-rubber no-slip bottom, the indoor slippers will keep your feet warm and cozy throughout the seasons. In the kids T-Rex Slippers, sized for kids of all ages, adults and children alike are wrapped in cuddly comfort.
